properties.name: silenteight.bridge.address
properties.description: Bridge HTTP address.

properties.name: silenteight.bridge.grpc.port
properties.description: Bridge GRPC port.

properties.name: silenteight.bridge.grpc.registration.governance-deadline
properties.description: Governance gRPC adapter deadline time.

properties.name: silenteight.bridge.grpc.registration.adjudication-engine-deadline
properties.description: Adjudication gRPC adapter deadline time.

properties.name: silenteight.bridge.grpc.recommendation.recommendation-deadline
properties.description: Recommendation gRPC adapter deadline time.

properties.name: silenteight.bridge.http.port
properties.description: Bridge HTTP port.

properties.name: registration.analysis.alert-ttl
properties.description: The time the alert needs to have its recommendation generated. When the deadline is getting close, the recommendation might be generated without waiting for the agents to complete their work.

properties.name: registration.analysis.mock-recommendations-generation
properties.description: Feature switch to specify whether recommendations generation should be mocked when alerts have been added to the analysis.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-error.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for notify batch error stored event.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-error.solving-batch-routing-key
properties.description: Routing key for notify batch error in solving use case.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-error.simulation-batch-routing-key
properties.description: Routing key for notify batch error in simulation use case.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-completed.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for notify batch completed event.

properties.name: amqp.recommendation.incoming.notify-batch-timeout.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for notify batch timeout event.

properties.name: amqp.recommendation.incoming.notify-batch-timeout.queue-name
properties.description: Queue name for notify batch timeout event.

properties.name: amqp.recommendation.incoming.notify-batch-timeout.dead-letter-queue-name
properties.description: Dead letter queue name for notify batch timeout event.

properties.name: amqp.recommendation.incoming.notify-batch-timeout.dead-letter-queue-time-to-live-in-milliseconds
properties.description: Dead letter queue time to live for notify batch timeout event.

properties.name: amqp.recommendation.incoming.notify-batch-timeout.dead-letter-exchange-name
properties.description: Dead letter exchange name for notify batch timeout event.

properties.name: amqp.recommendation.number-of-retries-dead-messages
properties.description: Amount of retries for a message before it will be discarded.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.verify-batch-timeout.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for verify batch time out event.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-timed-out.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for notify batch timed out event.

properties.name: amqp.registration.incoming.verify-batch-timeout.delayed-queue-name
properties.description: Delayed queue name for verifying batch time out.

properties.name: amqp.registration.incoming.verify-batch-timeout.queue-name
properties.description: Queue name for verifying batch time out.

properties.name: amqp.registration.incoming.verify-batch-timeout.error-alerts-queue-name
properties.description: Queue name for verifying batch time out for batch with all error alerts.

properties.name: amqp.registration.incoming.verify-batch-timeout.queue-time-to-live-in-milliseconds
properties.description: Dead letter queue TTL for verifying batch time out.

properties.name: amqp.registration.incoming.verify-batch-timeout.dead-letter-exchange-name
properties.description: Dead letter exchange name for verifying batch time out.

properties.name: amqp.registration.number-of-retries-dead-messages
properties.description: Amount of retries for a message before it will be discarded.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-delivered.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for notify batch delivered event.

properties.name: amqp.reports.outgoing.exchange-name
properties.description: Reports exchange name.

properties.name: amqp.reports.outgoing.routing-key
properties.description: Reports routing key.

properties.name: amqp.reports.incoming.batch-delivered.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange for reports batch delivered events.

properties.name: amqp.reports.incoming.batch-delivered.queue-name
properties.description: Queue for reports batch delivered events.

properties.name: amqp.reports.incoming.batch-delivered.dead-letter-queue-name
properties.description: Dead letter queue name for reports batch delivered events.

properties.description: Dead letter queue TTL for reports batch delivered events.

properties.name: amqp.reports.incoming.batch-delivered.dead-letter-exchange-name
properties.description: Dead letter exchange for reports batch delivered events.

properties.name: reports.enabled
properties.description: Enable reports to be send to warehouse.

properties.name: registration.verify-batch-timeout.delay-time
properties.description: Batch TTL before it gets timed out.

properties.name: registration.verify-batch-timeout.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable batch timeout handling.
